attributes.action: comment on the question "sometimes a scream is better than a thesis" Ralph Waldo Emerson 1803-1882
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This quote comes from Ralph Waldo Emerson an American Transcendentalist in the 19th Century.
Believing that sometimes direct action is better than petitioning or theorising. ie There will be a quicker result if the MPs revolt at the 10p tax disapperarance than queitly petition him.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
